ct:Test.name: FileNameCheckEOF
ct:Test.description: The name of the EOF file should be consistent with the product name in the fixed header

ct:Test.name: FileNameCheckHDR
ct:Test.description: The name of the HDR file should be consistent with the product name in the fixed header

ct:Test.name: FileNameMatchCreationDate
ct:Test.description: The creation date in the product name should be consistent with the creation date field in the header

ct:Tests.ct:Test: substr(25, 15, str(.)) == substr(4, 4, str(../Source/Creation_Date)) + substr(9, 2, str(../Source/Creation_Date)) + substr(12, 5, str(../Source/Creation_Date)) + substr(18, 2, str(../Source/Creation_Date)) + substr(21, 2, str(../Source/Creation_Date))

ct:Test.name: FileNameMatchFileClass
ct:Test.description: The file class in the product name should be consistent with the file class field in the header

ct:Test.name: FileNameMatchFileType
ct:Test.description: The file type in the product name should be consistent with the file type field in the header

ct:Test.name: FileNameMatchSystem
ct:Test.description: The site centre in the product name should be consistent with the system field in the header

ct:Test.name: FixedValueSentinel1x
ct:Test.description: The value should be either 'Sentinel-1A' or 'Sentinel-1B'

ct:Test.name: FixedValue0
ct:Test.description: The value should be 0

ct:Test.name: FixedValue2
ct:Test.description: The value should be 2

ct:Test.name: FixedValue3
ct:Test.description: The value should be 3

ct:Test.name: FixedValue20
ct:Test.description: The value should be 20

ct:Test.name: FixedValue23
ct:Test.description: The value should be 23

ct:Test.name: FixedValue24
ct:Test.description: The value should be 24

ct:Test.name: FixedValue27
ct:Test.description: The value should be 27

ct:Test.name: FixedValue29
ct:Test.description: The value should be 29

ct:Test.name: PhysicalFileSizeCheck
ct:Test.description: The value of this field should match the actual file size

ct:Test.name: ValidityPeriodOrder
ct:Test.description: Validity start time should be before (or equal to) validity stop time

ct:Test.name: ValueOfCountAttributeForParent
ct:Test.description: The value for the count attribute of the parent List_of_... element should equal the number of occurences of this element

ct:Test.name: IndexValue
ct:Test.description: The index value should be the one-based index of the item in the array of XML elements

ct:Test.name: IndexValue2
ct:Test.description: The index value should be the one-based index of the item in the array of XML elements using a stride of 2

ct:Test.name: Range1bitUnsigned
ct:Test.description: The value should fit in a 1 bit unsigned integer

ct:Test.name: Range2bitUnsigned
ct:Test.description: The value should fit in a 2 bit unsigned integer

ct:Test.name: Range4bitUnsigned
ct:Test.description: The value should fit in a 4 bit unsigned integer

ct:Test.name: Range5bitUnsigned
ct:Test.description: The value should fit in a 6 bit unsigned integer

ct:Test.name: RangeAmplitudePredistortion
ct:Test.description: The value should be >= 645 and <= 1023

ct:Test.name: RangeBAQBlockSize
ct:Test.description: The value should be >= 3 and <= 31

ct:Test.name: RangeBitrateValueCount
ct:Test.description: The number of Bitrate_Value elements should be >= 1 and <= 8192

ct:Test.name: RangeBitrateValue
ct:Test.description: The value should be >= 0 and <= 8191

ct:Test.name: RangeBRTEntryCount
ct:Test.description: The number of BRT_Entry elements should be >= 1 and <= 3

ct:Test.name: RangeBRTIndex
ct:Test.description: The value should be >= 0 and <= 2

ct:Test.name: RangeBSTCount
ct:Test.description: The number of BST elements should be >= 0 and <= 32

ct:Test.name: RangeBSTEntryCount
ct:Test.description: The number of BST_Entry elements should be >= 0 and <= 2048

ct:Test.name: RangeConfigurationIdentifier
ct:Test.description: The value should be >= 0 and <= 99999999

ct:Test.name: RangeCompressionDataType
ct:Test.description: The value should be >= 0 and <= 7

ct:Test.name: RangeCompressionIndex
ct:Test.description: The value should be >= 0 and <= 3839

ct:Test.name: RangeCompressionValuesCount
ct:Test.description: The number of Compression_Values elements should be >= 1 and <= 3840

ct:Test.name: RangeCPTEntryCount
ct:Test.description: The number of CPT_Entry elements should be >= 1 and <= 8

ct:Test.name: RangeECCLongProgCount
ct:Test.description: The number of ECC_Short_Prog elements should be >= 0 and <= 16

ct:Test.name: RangeECCLongProgElementCount
ct:Test.description: The number of ECC_Program_Element elements should be >= 1 and <= 576

ct:Test.name: RangeECCLongProgElementNumber
ct:Test.description: The value should be >= 1 and <= 576

ct:Test.name: RangeECCLongProgNumber
ct:Test.description: The value should be >= 32 and <= 47

ct:Test.name: RangeECCShortProgCount
ct:Test.description: The number of ECC_Short_Prog elements should be >= 0 and <= 32

ct:Test.name: RangeECCShortProgElementCount
ct:Test.description: The number of ECC_Program_Element elements should be >= 1 and <= 288

ct:Test.name: RangeECCShortProgElementNumber
ct:Test.description: The value should be >= 1 and <= 288

ct:Test.name: RangeECCShortProgNumber
ct:Test.description: The value should be >= 0 and <= 31

ct:Test.name: RangeECTEntryCount8
ct:Test.description: The number of ECT_Entry elements should be 8

ct:Test.name: RangeECTEntryCount16
ct:Test.description: The number of ECT_Entry elements should be 16

ct:Test.name: RangeDTPEntryCount
ct:Test.description: The number of DTP_Entry elements should be >= 1 and <= 5120

ct:Test.name: RangeFCRTEntryCount
ct:Test.description: The number of FCRT_Entry elements should be >= 1 and <= 16

ct:Test.name: RangeFCTEntryCount
ct:Test.description: The number of FCT_Entry elements should be >= 1 and <= 16

ct:Test.name: RangeFCTPhaseCount
ct:Test.description: The number of FCT_Phase elements should be >= 1 and <= 8

ct:Test.name: RangeFCTPhaseNumber
ct:Test.description: The value should be >= 0 and <= 7

ct:Test.name: RangeFCTSectionCount
ct:Test.description: The number of FCT_Section elements should be >= 1 and <= 8

ct:Test.name: RangeFCTSectionNumber
ct:Test.description: The value should be >= 0 and <= 7

ct:Test.name: RangeFCTValueCount
ct:Test.description: The number of FCT_Value elements should be >= 1 and <= 40

ct:Test.name: RangeFPPOTEntryCount
ct:Test.description: The number of FPPOT_Entry elements should be >= 1 and <= 16

ct:Test.name: RangeFilterNumber
ct:Test.description: The value should be >= 0 and <= 15

ct:Test.name: RangeFilterProgramPointer
ct:Test.description: The value should be >= 0 and <= 255

ct:Test.name: RangeFPPRTEntryCount
ct:Test.description: The number of FPPRT_Entry elements should be >= 1 and <= 252

ct:Test.name: RangeFPPRTIndex
ct:Test.description: The value should be >= 0 and <= 251

ct:Test.name: RangeFilterProgramEntry
ct:Test.description: The value should be >= 0 and <= 1073741823

ct:Test.name: RangePDTEntryCount
ct:Test.description: The number of PDT_Entry elements should be 64

ct:Test.name: RangePTTEntryCount
ct:Test.description: The number of PTT_Entry elements should be >= 1 and <= 32

ct:Test.name: RangePRIEntryCount
ct:Test.description: The number of PRI_Entry elements should be >= 1 and <= 16

ct:Test.name: RangeRxGainEntryCount
ct:Test.description: The number of Rx_Gain_Entry elements should be >= 1 and <= 16

ct:Test.name: RangeRTITEntryCount
ct:Test.description: The number of RTIT_Entry elements should be >= 1 and <= 1024

ct:Test.name: RangeRTITIndex
ct:Test.description: The value should be >= 0 and <= 1023

ct:Test.name: RangeRZWTEntryCount
ct:Test.description: The number of RZWT_Entry elements should be >= 1 and <= 128

ct:Test.name: RangeRZWTIndex
ct:Test.description: The value should be >= 0 and <= 127

ct:Test.name: RangeSwathNumber
ct:Test.description: The value should be >= 0 and <= 127

ct:Test.name: RangeSwathParametersTableCount
ct:Test.description: The number of Swath_Parameters_Table elements should be >= 1 and <= 128

ct:Test.name: RangeSWLEntryCount
ct:Test.description: The number of SWL_Entry elements should be >= 1 and <= 64

ct:Test.name: RangeSWSTEntryCount
ct:Test.description: The number of SWST_Entry elements should be >= 1 and <= 256

ct:Test.name: RangeSignalType
ct:Test.description: The value should be one of 0, 1, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15

ct:Test.name: RangeTestPatternGeneratorDataLength
ct:Test.description: The value should be >= 1 and <= 2560

ct:Test.name: RangeTotalNoOrbitSwathDataWindows
ct:Test.description: The value should be >= 5500 and <= 6500

ct:Test.name: RangeTPLUTEntryCount
ct:Test.description: The number of TPLUT_Entry elements should be 32

ct:Test.name: RangeTPTEntryCount
ct:Test.description: The number of TPT_Entry elements should be >= 1 and <= 32

ct:Test.name: RangeTxPulseRxBandwithEntryCount
ct:Test.description: The number of Tx_Pulse_Rx_Bandwith_Entry elements should be >= 1 and <= 16

ct:Test.name: ECCProgramElementOptionalFieldCount
ct:Test.description: Only one of the optional elements in the ECC_Program_Element can be present
